channel.title: Going away for a week
channel.description:
Hey everyone, since I am so loved here :P I thought I would post that I will be gone for the next week. I have an overnight hockey camp for a week. (No, my parents aren't just trying to get rid of me. xD)
I know everyone will miss me :rolleyes:, but don't worry, I will be back! However, when I get back I have 5 days to pack up. As I am going on a nice holiday for 3 weeks.
Don't be sad though, because I will be back after that! Unfortuanatly I have two days before another hockey camp. But that one isn't overnight, so I will be back in 4 weeks.
Wow, I think that Global Warming heat is starting to get to me. :| :P
See ya everyone, don't go anywhere while I'm gone. :) I know everyone will await my return. :P
I think I use to much smilies. Meh, thats what they are they're for.

item.title: Going away for a week
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

wooo cheese spunk is back

Read full topic

item.title: Going away for a week
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:5, topic:5849”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=7831.msg83086#msg83086 date=1153636994]

We all know your too busy with fan mail.

Ya, I do what I can do. The rest I just use as stuffings to make dummies to practice my roundhouse kicking.

Bye Everyone.
[/quote]
you round house ure stalkers as well?[/quote]

Yes.

Chuck Norris is back… for now.

Read full topic
